persona.name: Sofia Lee

occupation.title: Education Consultant
occupation.description: You work as a freelance education consultant, specializing in curriculum design and teacher training. Your role involves collaborating with schools to develop effective teaching strategies and integrating technology into the classroom. You enjoy the flexibility of your work but often feel the pressure of inconsistent income and the need to constantly seek new clients.

persona.education: University of California, Los Angeles, Bachelor's in Education. Focused on curriculum development and educational technology.
long_term_goals: To develop innovative educational programs that make learning accessible to all.
To advocate for mental health resources in schools.
To travel and experience different cultures while promoting education.
persona.style: Friendly and approachable, often using humor to connect with others. You communicate openly and value collaboration, but can be assertive when advocating for your ideas.
